page.title: 08FARMING (CONT)
page.content: {Wheat and Barley}are grown on one local farm covering 102 acres. There is grazing for{120 cows, 60 pigs}and {11 horses.}The same family has always farmed this farm, which has 3 farm hands. Sometimes a bad winter makes life hard but the{cows}can remain indoors and the crops are rarely damaged by extreme cold. A farmers working day usually consists of 14 - 15 hours starting at 4 a.m. One of the largest farms in our area is over 600 acres. It is one of a collection of smaller farms. The crops are{Wheat, Barley and Oil Seed Rape, the animals are{Beef Cattle and Sheep. The oldest part of the buildings is 200 years old and farming is no longer the leisurely process it was when the farm was first built. One problem the farmer has is local children trampling on his crops.
